content: According to the same Zuora survey, the use of annual billing varies by industry. For example, the media and publishing industry has the highest adoption rate of annual billing at 85% compared to other industries, followed by manufacturing at 72%, and communications and media at 68%. However, some industries like healthcare, retail, and education have relatively lower rates of adoption of annual billing, with only 38%, 48%, and 50%, respectively, offering it as an option to their customers.
